segments.text: I cannot believe the scene unfolding before me in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, diligently drying a dish, completely unaware of the flood she's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically submerged, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry to see such a lack of awareness in an adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, two children are engaged in a dangerous act of thievery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on a highly unstable stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip backward, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a real sense of dread watching him teeter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these children?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is so irresponsible, it's unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to get seriously hurt in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch these hazards go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire household seems utterly oblivious to reality.
segments.speaker: PAR
